name: Careen Racer
description:
Careen Racer - A game jam entry that pits you against the timer in this fun, top-down racing game.

Created by Paul Trandem and Wade Kallhoff

CONTROLS:

  • W, Up: accelerate
  • S, Down: brake, reverse
  • A/D, Left/right arrow: Turn
  • Space: handbrake
  • LShift: Boost

CREDITS

  • ART: 
    • GAMEPLAY: Kenney Art Pack(s), modified to taste
    • TITLE: Ferrari from MaxPixel.net, modified to taste
  • MUSIC:
    • One Track: Paul Trandem original
    • Four tracks: TeknoAXE ( http://teknoaxe.com )
  • Sound Effects
    • TBA
